feed.title: visitballyhoura TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from visitballyhoura

entry.title: Handy tips for longer days in the saddle! If you're new to Ballyhoura's mountain biking trails, here are a few handy tips on what to bring for the bigger loops (Tech Route 24km, Garrane Route 35km, Castlepook Route 54km). Is there something we've missed?
entry.content: Handy tips for longer days in the saddle! If you're new to Ballyhoura's mountain biking trails, here are a few handy tips on what to bring for the bigger loops (Tech Route 24km, Garrane Route 35km, Castlepook Route 54km). Is there something we've missed?

entry.title: Leah Maunsell takes on Toto, one of the new black trails in the Ballyhouras. Leah is the 9 x women's Elite Irish Enduro National Champion 🇮🇪 and the Ballyhouras are her local. Have you tried the new trails yet? Let us know what you think below ⬇️ @Leah @
entry.content: Leah Maunsell takes on Toto, one of the new black trails in the Ballyhouras. Leah is the 9 x women's Elite Irish Enduro National Champion 🇮🇪 and the Ballyhouras are her local. Have you tried the new trails yet? Let us know what you think below ⬇️ @Leah @

entry.title: Perfect weather for discovering something a little different...🚵🏽‍♀️ The Lough Gur Cycling Loop, also called the Kilmallock Route 3, is a 62 km (~4 hours) leisurely spin from Kilmallock Library. Download the free Ballyhoura Trails app for directions or he

entry.title: A wholesome day out at Slí Eile Christmas market this past weekend 🤗 We loved discovering unique hand-made goods from a diverse range of stall-holders, shopping for seasonal organic produce from the Slí Eile farm shop, enjoying the live music and trad se

entry.title: Goals? Julia Piorek, 10, knows all about them 😍 Julia started mountain biking at age 8, inspired by her father Greg and brother Filip, in the Ballyhouras. The network of trails is perfect for beginners, with so much variety for progression. Already compet

entry.title: Oisín O'Callaghan approves of Ballyhoura's new trails!⚡ "We now have a good variety of blues, reds, blacks; it's going to be a big improvement for all the youngsters coming up—and for me, training, upping my skill levels.”—Oisín O'Callaghan ⚠️ Please note

entry.title: Lough Gur is magical at any time of the day ✨ Come and enjoy breathtaking views of the lake, and don't miss Lough Gur's Easter Craft Fair next Saturday, with a variety of handmade goods from a diverse range of stalls. 📍Lough Gur Lakeshore Park 📅 Sat 30th
entry.content: Lough Gur is magical at any time of the day ✨ Come and enjoy breathtaking views of the lake, and don't miss Lough Gur's Easter Craft Fair next Saturday, with a variety of handmade goods from a diverse range of stalls. 📍Lough Gur Lakeshore Park 📅 Sat 30th

entry.title: "𝑨𝒏𝒅 𝒂𝒕 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒆𝒏𝒅 𝒐𝒇 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒅𝒂𝒚, 𝒚𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝒇𝒆𝒆𝒕 𝒔𝒉𝒐𝒖𝒍𝒅 𝒃𝒆 𝒅𝒊𝒓𝒕𝒚, 𝒚𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝒉𝒂𝒊𝒓 𝒎𝒆𝒔𝒔𝒚, 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝒚𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝒆𝒚𝒆𝒔 𝒔𝒑𝒂𝒓𝒌𝒍𝒊𝒏𝒈." Come and explore your next adventure at the Ballyhoura Mountain Bike Trails 🚴 nestled in the beautiful Ballyhoura mountains ⛰. Immerse yourself deep in the
